XXdavyasou:0: śrī siddhārthaḥ kapilanagare bodhisattvaḥ saputrāṃ devīṃ tyaktvā sakalavibhavaṃ cakravartiśriyaṃ ca |
XXdavyasou:1: māsy āṣāḍhe viratamanasā pūrṇimāyāṃ niśīthe niścakrāma śramaṇapadabhṛn mokṣam anveṣṭukāmaḥ atha prabhāte śayanāt samutthitā sutena sārdhaṃ mahiṣī yaśodharā |
XXdavyasou:2: didṛkṣayā svāmivarasya satvaraṃ gatāvidūre śayanīyamandiram || Yaśo_2 ||
XXdavyasou:3: yathā pure vañcayituṃ sa me patī rahogataḥ kutra cid eva gūḍhavān |
XXdavyasou:4: vicintya saudhe 'ntarabāhiraṃ bhṛśaṃ parīkṣyamāṇāpi dadarśa naiva tam || Yaśo_3 ||
XXdavyasou:5: dadhāva tasmāt sacivasya mandiraṃ gavākṣam udghāṭya drutaṃ drutaṃ śucā |
XXdavyasou:6: kapāṭam āhatya dṛḍhaṃ muhur muhur vyarīravac channa bhavan bhavann iti || Yaśo_4 ||
XXdavyasou:7: apekṣya kiṃ cit kvaṇam antarād gṛhe vyatiṣṭhatālpaṃ pratihārasannidhau |
XXdavyasou:8: vicārabhaṅgāc chvasatī ca pāṇinā pratāḍayām āsa kapolayugmakam || Yaśo_5 ||
XXdavyasou:9: tato gatā sā nṛpamandurālayaṃ turaṅgamaṃ nātra dadarśa kanthakam |
XXdavyasou:10: kuto yayau kiṃ rahasā sa vallabho vitarkayantīti babhūva mūrchitā || Yaśo_6 ||
XXdavyasou:11: vicintya yat kiṃ cid itas tataḥ śiraś cacāla jaghrau ca mukhe sutasya sā |
XXdavyasou:12: bhujātapatreṇa vilocanadvayān nyavārayat sā sravadaśruśīkaram || Yaśo_7 ||
XXdavyasou:13: aśaknuvantī nitarāṃ samudgamāṃ manovyathāṃ soḍhum udagramanyunā |
XXdavyasou:14: patipradattaṃ maṇikaṇṭhabhūṣaṇaṃ pravālamālām api kuṇḍaladvayam || Yaśo_8 ||
XXdavyasou:16: vimucya śīrṣābharaṇaṃ ca kaṅkaṇe sasarja dhig dhig vadatī sasambhramam || Yaśo_9 ||
XXdavyasou:17: atītaḍat pādatalena bhūtalaṃ jajṛmbha ūrdhvaṃ vicakarṣa mūrdhajam |
XXdavyasou:18: jajalpa vākyaṃ vigatārtham ākulaṃ rurāva bhīteva ruroda gadgadam || Yaśo_10 ||
XXdavyasou:19: niveśya bālaṃ śayane punaḥ punaḥ samutkṣipantī yugapat karadvayam |
XXdavyasou:20: vikampya śīrṣaṃ ca yathā vicetanā jughoṣa śaśvāsa papāta vivyathe || Yaśo_11 ||
XXdavyasou:21: nipīḍyamānāpi bubhukṣayāniśaṃ na bhojanaṃ bhoktum iyeṣa kiṃ cana |
XXdavyasou:22: tṛṣāturā nodakabindum apy asau papau ca kāye 'py babhūva vepathuḥ || Yaśo_12 ||
XXdavyasou:23: nihanyate dhīsmṛtiśaktidhīratā śarīravarṇaṃ balam indriyeṣv api |
XXdavyasou:24: vinaśyate jīvam anukrameṇa ca durantateyaṃ priyaviprayogatā || Yaśo_13 ||
XXdavyasou:25: niṣadya bhūmyāṃ vinatārdhavigrahā śiraś ca pāṇidvayam aṅkamastake |
XXdavyasou:26: niveśya kiṃ cit pariṇamya kaṃdharaṃ mamajja cintājaladhāv apāśraye || Yaśo_14 ||
XXdavyasou:28: nivāsam utsṛjya gato nu kānanam iti pravādo 'pi bhaved aho mama || Yaśo_15 ||
XXdavyasou:29: yad asti kāryaṃ triṣu mandireṣu tac cakāra kāryakṣamasevikā yathā |
XXdavyasou:30: gatau sthitau vā śayane ca vipriyaṃ kadā canāhaṃ na cakāra kiṃ cana || Yaśo_16 ||
XXdavyasou:31: vicintayantī sahasāgatāpadaṃ pragamya devāyatanaṃ priyaṃ prati |
XXdavyasou:32: sugandhipuspair api dhūmadīpakair apūpujad devagaṇaṃ sagauravam || Yaśo_17 ||
XXdavyasou:33: bhujadvayaṃ mūrdhni niveśya śokinī vilokya devapratimānanaśriyam |
XXdavyasou:34: praṇamya bhaktyā pariśuddhacetasā yayāca devān iti viprayogataḥ || Yaśo_18 ||
XXdavyasou:36: mahānubhāvā jagadīśvarāḥ surāḥ suduḥkhitāyai śaraṇaṃ bhavantu me || Yaśo_19 ||
XXdavyasou:37: vidhāya yācñām iti devahastayor upāyanīkṛtya babandha kārṣikau |
XXdavyasou:38: upāharan miṣṭanavāmbupāyasaṃ sitāṃśukaṃ svarṇamayīṃ ca putrikām || Yaśo_20 ||
XXdavyasou:39: pramodam āpādayituṃ sureśvarāṃś cakāra ghaṇṭāninadaṃ ca bhūsurān |
XXdavyasou:40: ajījapad devagirā ca saṃstavān nanāma bhūmāv asakṛt nipatya sā || Yaśo_21 ||
XXdavyasou:41: pure vane saṃvasathe 'pi vallabho vased dhi kasminn iti divyācakṣuṣā |
XXdavyasou:42: vilokya gehaṃ vinivartayantu taṃ divaukasaḥ prārthayataiva sā punaḥ || Yaśo_22 ||
XXdavyasou:43: nirīkṣya jihmānimiṣeṇa cakṣuṣā nihatya gāḍhaṃ caraṇaṃ bhuvas tale |
XXdavyasou:44: muhur muhur daṃśitakomalādharā prakarṣam utkṣipya vikampya tarjanīm || Yaśo_23 ||
XXdavyasou:45: are-tvayāryasya gṛhābhiniṣkramaḥ śruto na dṛṣṭaḥ vada kiṃ nirākulam |
XXdavyasou:46: iti pratīhārabhaṭaṃ ruṣoccakai raveṇa papraccha sabāṣpalocanā || Yaśo_24 ||
XXdavyasou:47: bhavān sa ārye nṛpavaṃśaśekharo mayā na dṛṣṭaḥ pratihāram āgataḥ |
XXdavyasou:48: varāṅganābhiḥ saha kelikānane gate niśīthe 'ramateti me śrutam || Yaśo_25 ||
XXdavyasou:49: avītarāgo nanu rājanandano vavāñcha tasmān nanu nūtanapriyām |
XXdavyasou:50: mithaḥ sa kāṃ cit pariṇīya nāṭikāṃ bahir gato 'ddheti vitarkayāmy aham || Yaśo_26 ||
XXdavyasou:51: purā hi mandhātvabhidho mahāyaśāḥ sa sārvabhaumo 'pi surāṅganāgaṇe |
XXdavyasou:52: kṛtānurāgo parivarjya mānuṣīṃ śriyaṃ prapede nu divaukasāṃ puram || Yaśo_27 ||
XXdavyasou:54: agastipatnīṃ parirabhya tāpasīṃ lalāsa rantuṃ niśi pākaśāsanaḥ || Yaśo_28 ||
XXdavyasou:57: vigṛhya sītāṃ janakātmajām api nijapriyāvad vyadadhāt tadātmasāt || Yaśo_29 ||
XXdavyasou:58: maheśvaraś cāpi purā tapaś carann umāmahiṣyā saha kalikānane |
XXdavyasou:59: apāsya sātatyasamādhibhāvanaṃ vyarīramac cājanayat sutau nanu || Yaśo_30 ||
XXdavyasou:60: śucākulāṃ sāntvayituṃ vadhūttamām iti pratīhāra uraḥsthale 'ñjalim |
XXdavyasou:61: vidhāya valgudhvaninānukampayā natena mūrdhnā vacasā vyajijñapat || Yaśo_31 ||
XXdavyasou:64: aharmukhe kiṃ niśi vā dadarśitha vyapṛcchad itthaṃ nijasevikāṃ ruṣā || Yaśo_32 ||
XXdavyasou:65: nidhāya vāmetarajānumaṇḍalaṃ kṣitau bhujau cāpi lalāṭamastake |
XXdavyasou:66: natārdhakāyaṃ nijagāda sevikā śrutaṃ ca dṛṣṭaṃ na na vedmi kiṃ cana || Yaśo_33 ||
XXdavyasou:71: praśasyarūpeṇa girā ca valgunā śriyā 'pi dhṛtyā tava kakṣam āgatāḥ |
XXdavyasou:72: mahottame sarvajanena mānitā bhavanti tasya tritayāḥ priyāṅganāḥ || Yaśo_35 ||
XXdavyasou:75: sadaiva tābhī ramate kumārakaḥ kadā cid anyatra mano 'sya no rajet || Yaśo_36 ||
XXdavyasou:76: jugupsite satpuruṣair manasvibhiḥ sadoṣakāme vimukho nu te patiḥ |
XXdavyasou:78: śrutā na dṛṣṭā na divā vā niśi || Yaśo_37 ||
XXdavyasou:79: tapodhanānāṃ samatām upeyivān ratiṃ na kuryāt sa bhavatraye kva cit |
XXdavyasou:81: kathaṃ vidhatte ratim eṣa te patiḥ || Yaśo_38 ||
XXdavyasou:83: atarpaṇīye vividhānnapānakaiḥ spṛhāṃ na dehe prakaroti paṇḍitaḥ || Yaśo_39 ||
XXdavyasou:85: śarīra ālokya jano vinaśyate pataṅgavad dīpaśikhojjvalaprabhām || Yaśo_40 ||
XXdavyasou:87: divaukasāṃ nandanakānanopamaṃ jagāma rājopavanaṃ calātmanā || Yaśo_41 ||
XXdavyasou:89: kimartham ārye 'tra samāgatis tava bhavāmi jijñāsur iti nyavedayat || Yaśo_42 ||
XXdavyasou:90: sakhe mamāryo rahasāruṇodaye samāgato vātra na kiṃ samāgataḥ |
XXdavyasou:91: kim atra dṛṣṭaḥ sa na vā śrutas tvayā vicintya samyag vada māṃ yathātatham || Yaśo_43 ||
XXdavyasou:92: gataspṛhaḥ pañcasu kāmavastuṣu sa āryaputro vijitendriyo bhavet |
XXdavyasou:93: tato 'bhirāmopavanaṃ samāgamo na dṛṣṭa ārye na hi vā śruto mayā || Yaśo_44 ||
XXdavyasou:95: divo 'vatīrṇo nanu puṇyatejasā manuṣyajanmany ajaniṣṭa sa prabhuḥ || Yaśo_45 ||
XXdavyasou:96: mahāmahe saty asitarṣir īyivān divaṃ kim ity asya vimṛśya kāraṇam |
XXdavyasou:97: svamitraśuddhodanabhūpateḥ suto 'janīti harṣāt tam avekṣituṃ yayau || Yaśo_46 ||
XXdavyasou:98: tato 'sitarṣir nṛpasaudham āgataḥ kumārakaṃ vīkṣya sapuṇyasampadam |
XXdavyasou:100: jagāda vākyaṃ śiśur eṣa puṇyavān bhaved dhi buddho hatamārabandhanaḥ |
XXdavyasou:102: dvijeṣu pañcasv atha dehalakṣaṇaṃ parīkṣya kauṇḍaṇyabudho 'bravīd iti |
XXdavyasou:103: vinaśya tṛṣṇādimalāny ayaṃ śiśur anuttaraṃ buddhapadaṃ gamiṣyati || Yaśo_49 ||
XXdavyasou:106: abhītanādaṃ nyanadaj jagattraye bhaveyam agras tv iti siṃhapotavat || Yaśo_50 ||
XXdavyasou:108: taraṃgiṇīśīkaramiśramāruto vavau samantād vipine śanaiḥ tadā || Yaśo_51 ||
XXdavyasou:109: mahātmanas tasya parārdhyajanmani vasuṃdharāyā nidhayaḥ samudgatāḥ |
XXdavyasou:110: dharāṅganā tarhy atimātramoditā savismayāṃ siddhim adarśayad bhuvi || Yaśo_52 ||
XXdavyasou:112: kumārakaṃ tau pitarau savatsalau sabandhuvargaṃ parivārya ninyatuḥ || Yaśo_53 ||
XXdavyasou:113: gurupradiṣṭaṃ vidhivad gurupriyaḥ samastavidyāsamayaṃ ca darśanam |
XXdavyasou:114: bhave bhave saṃcitapuṇyatejasā samadhyagīṣṭāciram eṣa buddhimā || Yaśo_54 ||
XXdavyasou:116: saha tvayā ṣoḍaśame hi hāyane vivāhadīkṣāṃ vidhivac cakāra nu || Yaśo_55 ||
